[ Package Index | Mudlib Index | Effect Index ]

File /std/room/council_vote.c

This is the room you will use to vote for magistrates.

Written by Pinkfish

Started Mon Oct 23 22:26:11 PDT 2000

Inherits

This class inherits the following classes /std/room/basic_room.c, /std/room/inherit/voting_room.c and /std/room/inherit/council_base.c

Includes

This class includes the following files /include/player_handler.h and /include/nomic_system.h

Method index

do_list_motions()
This lists all the new rules up for discussion or whatever by the magistrates.
do_nominate(string)
This method allows you to nominate someone for a position.
do_status()
This method prints some useful information about the election status of the current area.
do_vote(string, int)
This method allows you to vote for someone.
do_vote_on(int, string)
This method will handle voting on the specific new nomic rule.

Public Functions

These are functions that everyone can access.

.
do_list_motions
int do_list_motions()
This lists all the new rules up for discussion or whatever by the magistrates.

Returns:
1 on success, 0 on failure
do_nominate
int do_nominate(string person)
This method allows you to nominate someone for a position.

do_status
int do_status()
This method prints some useful information about the election status of the current area.

Returns:
1 on success, 0 on failure
do_vote
int do_vote(string person,
int force)
This method allows you to vote for someone.

do_vote_on
int do_vote_on(int num,
string vote)
This method will handle voting on the specific new nomic rule.

Parameters:
num - the rule number to vote on
vote - their vote
Returns:
1 on success, 0 on failure
